Posts.Content: Not to make light of your issue but I must tell you that unless you are concerned about how teenagers will react to you, then you have no problems. Breast cancer has gotten to be quite common place and then heavens with that came an understanding that a person is far more than the sum of their parts. I can think of a few large breasted women that 99% of the people wouldn't want to waste their time having coffee with. So don't waste a single second of your time thinking about it. Put on a smile, it makes all the difference B
Posts.Title: Life Without Breast

Posts.Content: Assuming you or a close relative/friend has cancer, then call a close friend and go out for lunch and talk over your concerns, anything is better than being alone or listening to negative people. B
Posts.Title: Emotion
